xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/2182-Attack of the Killer Tomatoes! 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cpQFOXpi5OlUnX6g3hLIoe6L7MC.jpg Attack of the Killer Tomatoes is a 1978 comedy film directed by John De Bello and starring David Miller. The film is a spoof of B-movies. Made on a budget of less than USD $100,000, the story involves tomatoes becoming sentient by unknown means and revolting against humanity. Attack of the Killer Tomatoes!
